TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StepResult/Parameter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a parameter that the diagnostic service should include when the diagnostic service runs the command for the RunStep stage of a diagnostic test.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying the name, value, or format for the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, string value) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, value As String)

Docs.param: A string that specifies the name of the parameter that the diagnostic service should include in the RunStep command.
A string that specifies the value for the parameter that the diagnostic service should include in the RunStep command.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and value.

MemberSignature.Value: public Parameter (string name, string value, string format);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, string value, string format) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, value As String, format As String)

Docs.param: A string that specifies the name of the parameter that the diagnostic service should include in the RunStep command.
A string that specifies the value for the parameter that the diagnostic service should include in the RunStep command.

A string that indicates the format that the diagnostic service should use when it specifies the parameter as part of the RunStep command. For this format string, {0} represents the parameter name and {1} represents the value that is specified for the parameter. For example, the default format string is -{0}:{1}, which indicates that the diagnostic service should specify the parameter as -name:value in the RunStep command.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, value, and format.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Format : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the format that the diagnostic service should use when it specifies the parameter as part of the RunStep command. For this format string, {0} represents the parameter name and {1} represents the value that is specified for the parameter. For example, the default format string is -{0}:{1}, which indicates the diagnostic service should specify the parameter as -name:value in the RunStep command.
Docs.value: A object that contains the format string for the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Name : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the name of the parameter that the diagnostic service should include in the RunStep command.
Docs.value: A object that contains the name of the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Value : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the value that the diagnostic service should use for the parameter in the RunStep command.
Docs.value: A object that contains the value.
